column4: Another newbie here, using the v9.10/i386 install. I am attempting to install gforth-0.7.0, and need to install the ffcall-1.10 package, so that when I recompile gforth, it will use the ffcall package.  I have both the gforth and ffcall .tar.gz files, and would like to put them in my /usr/bin/ directory, but when I try to extract the gforth package to /usr/bin/ I'm told that I don't have the...
...right permissions to do so.  What am I missing here...
is there something wrong with using "sudo aptitude install gforth"?
